ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And those who are mindful of their moral obligations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and who take due care of their Prayer:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and (finally) those who do not miss their ritual - prayers at the prescribed times;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And those who protect their prayers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And those who are with their Salah, Yuhafizun.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And those who keep a guard on their prayer,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And those who are attentive at their worship.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and are steadfast in their prayers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And those who of their prayer are observant.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and those who are watchful of their prayers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And those who guard (the sacredness) of their worship;-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And those who guard their Salat (prayers) well.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and who are constant in their prayers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And those who are dedicated to their prayers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And those who [carefully] maintain their prayer:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [70:34] and who preserve their prayers, by observing them in their appointed times.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And those who are attentive at their worship) they observe the prescribed times of their five daily prayers,
